transcripts.text: I have a panel here that has information that is beyond what you know.  And it's shocking.  And here's the thing. And I looked, and behold, a pale greenish, the color of death, and a corpse, and sickness.  And this horse, and his name that sat on him was Death, Listen to me.  That word death in the Revelation, the fourth horse of the apocalypse, that word death there means plague or pestilence.
